name: Prangobinda Nandi
body:
**Name :** Prangobinda Nandi **Address :** Village & P.O. : Choatore, P.S. : Bharatpur, District : Murshidabad **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2015 **Mentor :** Tanmay Goswami (Jadavpur University, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** Madhyamik : 76% ; Higher Secondary : 73.8% ; B.Sc. : 66.25% **Present Course :** Chemistry (PG II), Jadavpur University

Prangobinda is originally from Kandi in the district of Murshidabad. His father works as a daily labourer and strives hard to make ends meet. Some of his benevolent school teachers helped him with his early education and he passed his Higher Secondary Examinations with 73.8%. He went on to obtain a bachelor’s in Chemistry, with first class, from Kandi Raj College. Following that he got admitted to Jadavpur University for his master’s in 2015. Srijan Sujan has pledged to support his quest for higher education.

_To view the academic documents of Prangobinda Nandi please download the zip file or the tar file from the link the top._
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
